attributes.action: Action to be taken for fly-tipping on Lode Hill Caravan Site lane.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are concerned citizens who urge Wiltshire council to act now. The fly-tipping that takes place blocks ALL emergency services to access anyone if they were to fall ill. We have a lot of babies and young children living on here.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council to deal with flytipping. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://cms.wiltshire.gov.uk/mgMemberIndex.aspx?bcr=1 

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:  

https://cms.wiltshire.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
